channel.title: Thyago Raphael
channel.description: Sharing my interests in Swift, iOS, Apple & more

item.title: About
item.content:encoded:
About

Hey, 👋🏻 I'm Natanel, an iOS developer from NYC and welcome to my site where you'll find posts mostly about my experiences with Swift but possibly regarding my other interests including traveling, 🏔 Judaism, 🕍 espresso, ☕️ design 🖌 and electric longboarding. 🛹 My site was also built in Swift using John Sundell's amazing static site generator Publish and makes use of the beautiful Sofia typeface. I would love to hear from you at @niazoff or via email.
